trans-unit.source: Create app passwords in the Office 365 portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Create app passwords in the Office 365 portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: This page shows users how they can create additional app passwords in the Office 365 portal.
trans-unit.target: This page shows users how they can create additional app passwords in the Office 365 portal.

trans-unit.source: Create or delete app passwords in the Office 365 portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Create or delete app passwords in the Office 365 portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to create and delete app passwords through the Office 365 portal.
trans-unit.target: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to create and delete app passwords through the Office 365 portal.

trans-unit.source: To create app passwords in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: To create app passwords in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: <html></html>Sign-in to the Office 365 portal<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>Sign-in to the Office 365 portal<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>In the top right corner select the settings widget<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>In the top right corner select the settings widget<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>On the left, select Additional Security Verification<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>On the left, select Additional Security Verification<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cloud</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cloud</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the right, select Update my phone numbers used for account security
trans-unit.target: On the right, select Update my phone numbers used for account security

trans-unit.source: <html></html>On the proofup page, at the top, select app passwords<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>On the proofup page, at the top, select app passwords<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>

trans-unit.source: Click Create
trans-unit.target: Click Create

trans-unit.source: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>

trans-unit.source: Enter a name for the app password and click Next
trans-unit.target: Enter a name for the app password and click Next

trans-unit.source: <html></html>Copy the app password to the clipboard and paste it into your app.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>Copy the app password to the clipboard and paste it into your app.<html></html>

trans-unit.source: To delete app passwords in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: To delete app passwords in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: <html></html>Sign-in to the Office 365 portal<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>Sign-in to the Office 365 portal<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>In the top right corner select the widget and choose Office 365 Settings<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>In the top right corner select the widget and choose Office 365 Settings<html></html>

trans-unit.source: At the bottom, click Additional Security Verification and select Update your phone numbers used for account security.3
trans-unit.target: At the bottom, click Additional Security Verification and select Update your phone numbers used for account security.3

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cloud</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cloud</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the right, select Update my phone numbers used for account security
trans-unit.target: On the right, select Update my phone numbers used for account security

trans-unit.source: <html></html>On the proofup page, at the top, select app passwords<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>On the proofup page, at the top, select app passwords<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>

trans-unit.source: Next to the app password you want to remove, select Delete.
trans-unit.target: Next to the app password you want to remove, select Delete.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>You will get a pop-up asking you to confirm the deletion.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>You will get a pop-up asking you to confirm the deletion.<html></html>

trans-unit.source: Click Yes.
trans-unit.target: Click Yes.
